discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Using Auto-Responder for case deflections: Deflect cases by automatically sending relevant content through the Auto-Responder feature after a customer contact or consumer creates a case.

Whenever a case is created, the Auto-Responder feature sends an email notification containing a list of relevant knowledge articles. The email notifications are sent to the case submitter and watchlist users associated with the case.

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/auto-responder-case.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/auto-responder-case.html

questions.question_text: Which feature sends an email notification containing a list of relevant knowledge articles to the case submitter and watchlist users associated with the case whenever a case is created?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: BC
BC is correct

questions.question_text: Depending on the CSM application configurations, cases can be assigned to agents manually or by using auto-assignment. Which routing and assignment features leverage matching rules? (Choose two.)
What does Major issue Management use to identify all other customers impacted by a major case?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D is correct.
Identify affected customers by creating a recipients list of accounts or consumers and attaching it to the major case.

https://docs.servicenow.com/en-US/bundle/vancouver-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/major-issue-management.html

choices.A: Cases cannot be created from any of the social channels
choices.C: Cases can be created automatically depending on which social channel is used
choices.B: Cases are NOT created automatically from any of the social channels
choices.D: Cases are created automatically from all of the social channels

discussion.content: Correct answer is B, Agents can create social as communication channel. But Cases are not created automatically as this activity is manual at present. E book content

Selected Answer: C
Answer: C. Cases can be created automatically depending on which social channel is used

Selected Answer: C
Answer: C. Cases can be created automatically depending on which social channel is used

Explanation: "Social media - Create and resolve cases by communicating with customers through social media channels and record conversational history in the case." while didn't mention automatic case creation, but the fact that it can capture converation would indicate its possible to automate, hence C is the most logical answer

Source: https://www.servicenow.com/content/dam/servicenow-assets/public/en-us/doc-type/resource-center/data-sheet/ds-csm-omni-channel.pdf

questions.question_text: Which of the following is correct regarding the social med a channel?
When integrating Customer Service Management with IT Service management what separate action is required for Request Management?

choices.D: Activation of the Customer Service plugin (com.sn_customerservice)
choices.B: Activation of the Customer Service with Request Management plugin (com.sn_cs_sm_request)
choices.A: Activation of the Customer Service with Service Management plugin (com.sn_cs_sm)
choices.C: Activation of the Customer Service Case Action Status plugin (com.snc.csm_action_status)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Plugins
Integration with Request Management requires the Customer Service with Request Management plugin (com.sn_cs_sm_request).

Source: https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/washingtondc-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/concept/csm-integration-sm-request.html

Selected Answer: B
B is correct.

https://docs.servicenow.com/pt-BR/bundle/sandiego-customer-service-management/page/product/customer-service-management/reference/csm-integration-sm-request.html
